name: cgns
description:
The CFD General Notation System (CGNS) provides a general, portable, and
extensible standard for the storage and retrieval of computational fluid
dynamics (CFD) analysis data.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MVAPICH2-GDR is an optimized version of the MVAPICH2 MPI library for
GPU-enabled HPC and Deep Learning Applications. MVAPICH2-GDR is not
installable from source and is only available through a binary mirror.
If you do not find the binary you're looking for, send us an email at
mvapich@cse.ohio-state.edu. The binary mirror url is:
http://mvapich.cse.ohio-state.edu/download/mvapich/spack-
mirror/mvapich2-gdr/

dependent_to.name: gmsh
dependent_to.description:
Gmsh is a free 3D finite element grid generator with a built-in CAD
engine and post-processor. Its design goal is to provide a fast, light
and user-friendly meshing tool with parametric input and advanced
visualization capabilities. Gmsh is built around four modules: geometry,
mesh, solver and post-processing. The specification of any input to
these modules is done either interactively using the graphical user
interface or in ASCII text files using Gmsh's own scripting language.

dependent_to.name: seacas
dependent_to.description:
The SEACAS Project contains the Exodus and IOSS libraries and a
collection of applications which create, query, modify, or translate
exodus databases. Default is to build the exodus and IOSS libraries and
the io_shell, io_info, struc_to_unstruc apps.

dependent_to.name: petsc
dependent_to.description:
PETSc is a suite of data structures and routines for the scalable
(parallel) solution of scientific applications modeled by partial
differential equations.

dependent_to.name: trilinos
dependent_to.description:
The Trilinos Project is an effort to develop algorithms and enabling
technologies within an object-oriented software framework for the
solution of large-scale, complex multi-physics engineering and
scientific problems. A unique design feature of Trilinos is its focus on
packages.

dependent_to.name: visit-cgns
dependent_to.description:
This is the CGNS Plug-In for VisIt. It can be installed after VisIt is
installed along CGNS library.
